### Update dependencies

Automatically created PR from [`ci/dependabot-updates`](https://github.com/aiidateam/aiida-optimade/tree/ci/dependabot-updates).
It should be automagically merged into `main` upon CI success.

For more information see the ["Dependabot updates" workflow](https://github.com/aiidateam/aiida-optimade/blob/develop/.github/workflows/ci_dependabot.yml).
